verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great is the Lord, He is holy and just By His power we trust in His love God is the Lord, He is faithful and true. By His mercy He proves He is God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now lift up your voice Great is the Lord, great is the Lord.{/lang-eng}
